1.title: Nora's First Day at School
1.plot: A little girl named Nora is fretting over entering a new school. With the help of a special hippo teacher, Nora's fears come to an end and she learns to enjoy school.

2.title: A Picnic Day
2.plot: Ms. Hilda has a surprise for her class. They are going on a picnic. The children are excited, but they need to learn the alphabet first.

3.title: A Day at the Playground
3.plot: Ms. Hilda's children are in for an adventure when they go outside for activities, but not everything is bound to run smoothly.

4.title: The Lemonade Stand
4.plot: Ms. Hilda's class has a dilemma: they want a hamster as a class pet, but they don't know how to get the money. Will the children find a way to collect the money they need for their new hamster?

5.title: Mother's Day Celebration
5.plot: It's Mother's Day, and Ms. Hilda's children want to make gifts for their mothers. But learning new skills isn't always easy, and neither is working together as a team. Will the children succeed in creating beautiful gifts?

6.title: The World Map Jigsaw Puzzle
6.plot: When Rudy enters the class with a world map jigsaw puzzle, the children can't wait to put it together. They soon learn the importance of knowledge sharing and teamwork. They also learn to locate their favorite places on the world map.

7.title: Halloween
7.plot: It's Halloween and Ms. Hilda's class can't wait to go trick-or-treating, but first they must find their favorite costumes.

imdb.plot outline: Playing is an important part of children's learning and development. "My Teacher Hilda" is a video series that provides a Virtual Daycare/Kindergarten Experience to the children. The center stage of this series is the Bumble Bee Academy, a daycare run by Hilda, the head teacher. Appropriate for the children in the age ranges 3 years to 8 years, the series focuses on play based early learning. The cute animal characters continuously engage in fun filled learning activities. This series also aims to help children learn socialization before they join kindergarten to help make this important transition easier.
imdb.title: My Teacher Hilda
plot: Winner of multiple awards for best education series for children, _My Teacher Hilda_ (qv) follows Ms. Hilda's class at Bumble Bee Academy day care as the children engage in a range of fun learning activities.::Diane Scoffield

Playing is an important part of children's learning and development. "_My Teacher Hilda_ (qv)" is a video series that provides a Virtual Daycare/Kindergarten Experience to the children. The center stage of this series is the Bumble Bee Academy, a daycare run by Hilda, the head teacher. Appropriate for the children in the age ranges 3 years to 8 years, the series focuses on play based early learning. The cute animal characters continuously engage in fun filled learning activities. This series also aims to help children learn socialization before they join kindergarten to help make this important transition easier.::Ellen
